skills.name: Scarred Fury
skills.description: Stores a portion of DMG taken and then releases it, dealing DMG to surrounding units and gaining a shield.

upgrades.level2: Omniscient Arrow is guaranteed to trigger when the battle starts.
upgrades.level3: The bonus DMG is increased to 12% of the target's max HP (up to 400% of her ATK).
upgrades.level4: The arrow will deal DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Worldshaker
skills.description: Grapples a target, dashes to the most enemy-clustered area, and deals AoE DMG.

upgrades.level2: Every Normal Attack becomes an Omniscient Arrow for the duration of the skill.

skills.name: Savage Smash
skills.description: Deals DMG and knocks down units in a cone. Gains a shield and restores HP.

upgrades.level2: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 10% while ATK bonus lasts.
upgrades.level4: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 20% while the ATK bonus lasts.

skills.name: Godhood Ascension
skills.description: Heracles increases his max HP and converts his ATK into max HP.

upgrades.level2: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 25%.
upgrades.level3: Gains 1 extra stack of ATK SPD buff when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 30%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Defiant Roar
relic.description: Heals himself, gains GMD RED, and fully restores Energy when near death.

upgrades.level2: Increases CRIT Rate by 30% at 3 stacks.
upgrades.level4: Each stack increases Hit Rate by 30%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
